body_html:
In this case, it's purely bureaucratic. We have an internal list of issues that we need to respond to, and issues only appear if the template is filled out. We do this because most of the time, the template info is useful, and people still tend not to fill it out even when it is useful.

/CC @gunan, can you take a look at this issue?
